thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Shell Midstream Partners Reports Public Offering And Concurrent Private Placement Of Common Units

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shell Midstream Partners Reports Public Offering And Concurrent Private Placement Of Common Units
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Shell Midstream Partners Lp:
* SHELL MIDSTREAM PARTNERS, L.P. ANNOUNCES PUBLIC OFFERING AND CONCURRENT PRIVATE PLACEMENT OF COMMON UNITS
* SHELL MIDSTREAM PARTNERS LP - ‍COMMENCEMENT OF AN UNDERWRITTEN PUBLIC OFFERING OF 25 MILLION COMMON UNITS REPRESENTING LIMITED PARTNER INTERESTS​
* SHELL MIDSTREAM PARTNERS - ‍TO USE PROCEEDS FROM PUBLIC OFFERING & PRIVATE PLACEMENT TO REPAY AMOUNTS OUTSTANDING UNDER PARTNERSHIP‘S CREDIT FACILITIES​
* SHELL MIDSTREAM - WILL ALSO SELL $300 MILLION OF COMMON UNITS TO SHELL MIDSTREAM LP HOLDINGS AT SAME PRICE TO PUBLIC AS UNITS SOLD IN PUBLIC OFFERING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
